name: Game of Ur 7
description:
The game of Ur is the oldest known board game. You play against the computer. Each trying to get your seven pieces to home.

Two settings normal and easy.

I used a simpler version with four pieces each, a shorter road  and a much easier opponent as a mini-game in Defenders of Adacan

https://per-k-grok.itch.io/defenders-of-adacan
